setup.description: optional list of setup commands to execute before tracing

teardown.description: optional list of teardown commands to execute after tracing

traces.description: List of parameters for the desired traces to be collected

name.description: name to uniquely identify this trace

args.description: list of arguments for this trace

type.description: type of argument: concrete or symbolic

setup.description: optional list of setup commands to execute before this trace

teardown.description: optional list of teardown commands to execute after this trace

input_files.description: List of files to inject into the execution environment other than the target binary

source.description: Location on host system where the input file can be found.

destination.description: Location on the guest system where the input file should be mapped to for tracing.

permissions.description: Boolean value true to copy the permissions from the source file. Can also provide permissions as octal number.

stdin.description: Not yet implemented. Specify input to provide to the target binary via stdin.

match_stdout.description: Boolean to match stdout during validation. May also be regex to match against.

match_stderr.description: Boolean to match stderr during validation. May also be regex to match against.
